nodes.bodyText: Should this be using the agent?
Why? The locale is brand new in the bean, and it's used to render stuff in the user's language. Shouldn't that be okay?
because the rest of the logic in that method is using it!
I used agent in the first place, just because it was there already.
I suppose it could. I'll try it out now.
I switched them because I was testing if an instructor didn't have an agent string, like a student. That was it.
